title: Happy Birthday, Kanata-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Kanata-san, happy birthday, nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ooh, thanks, Rin-chan~. You’re as energetic as ever today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe. Hey, hey, Kanata-san, you remember how you made Rin some super delicious ramen before? To thank you for that, Rin decided to take you to her favorite ramen shop!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Wow~! You want to take me to your favorite ramen shop? Yay~! Let’s go, let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, no... why...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Temporarily closed due to an equipment malfunction, huh? That’s unfortunate.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sorry, Kanata-san... I’ll just think of another present, nya...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>...Is it okay if Kanata-chan requests a present from you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You want to make a request!? What is it, what is it!? Just say whatever you want!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan wants to make a better version of the ramen from before. Could you help taste it for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Huh? Last time... you made a clear soup from dried sardines and Hamaguri clams which smelled like yuzu, topped with homemade chicken chashu, bamboo shoots, green onion, spinach, and mekabu seaweed... that one, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh, I see you remember it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I’d never forget it, nya! After all, it was soooo good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I want to make something even better than that. I’d be really happy if you could help me with that to celebrate Kanata-chan’s birthday~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Leave it to Rin, nya~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
